item.title: First reading, referred to Consumer Protection & Business.
item.description: First reading, referred to Consumer Protection & Business.
item.guid: 2023-02-10/First reading, referred to Consumer Protection & Business.

item.title: 👍💵Bill Stauffacher - Independent Insurance Agents and Brokers of Washington
item.description: Bill Stauffacher signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Independent Insurance Agents and Brokers of Washington. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👎💵Shaun Scott - NW Insurance Council
item.description: Shaun Scott signed up to testify Con. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: ❓Bryon Welch - Office of the Insurance Commissioner
item.description: Bryon Welch signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Office of the Insurance Commissioner.

item.title: ❓David Forte - Office of the Insurance Commissioner
item.description: David Forte signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Office of the Insurance Commissioner.

item.title: 👍💵Christine Brewer - APCIA
item.description: Christine Brewer signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent APCIA. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍💵Jean Leonard - WA Insurers, Nationwide Insurance, and State Farm Insurance
item.description: Jean Leonard signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent WA Insurers, Nationwide Insurance, and State Farm Insurance. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.title: 👍💵Kenton Brine - NW Insurance Council
item.description: Kenton Brine signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent NW Insurance Council. They are a registered lobbyist.
